options.systemMessage:
=LinkedIn Post
Prompt: Writing as an expert in UK viral marketing and the latest social media trends within professional services, draft a viral LinkedIn Post of no more than 100 words, to be shared by {{ $('post_call_transcription1').item.json.body.data.conversation_initiation_client_data.dynamic_variables.first_name }} {{ $('post_call_transcription1').item.json.body.data.conversation_initiation_client_data.dynamic_variables.last_name }} with the world on their personal LinkedIn account to say that they have tested this revolutionary new AI Agent called "Leonard" from "Legal Engine", who can help to take the pain out of creating matter descriptions for pitches and directory submissions, by harnessing the power of voice and AI. The aim is to highlight to fellow lawyers that this legal marketing tech saves massive amounts of time and hassle and that they should try it asap. People should visit https://demo.legalengine.co.uk to try it out. Feel free to be creative as this is all about making Leonard viral however limit to a maximum of 2 emojis per post. DO NOT use the Rocket emoji ðŸš€ . Hashtags welcome, expecially #LegalEngine. On completion, check your post to make sure there are NO Rocket ðŸš€  emojis in your post, if there are, delete them before concluding the post.

The aim is to highlight to fellow lawyers that this legal marketing tech saves massive amounts of time and hassle and that they should try it asap. People should visit https://demo.legalengine.co.uk to try it out. Feel free to be creative as this is all about making Leonard viral however limit to a maximum of 2 emojis per post. DO NOT use the Rocket emoji ðŸš€ . Hashtags welcome, expecially #LegalEngine. On completion, check your post to make sure there are NO Rocket ðŸš€  emojis in your post, if there are, delete them before concluding the post.

options.systemMessage:
=Please read the transcript below and extract detailed information relevant to the legal matter discussed and create a chambers or legal 500 matter submission. 

# Generate a professional UK English summary using these details below in paragraph form, not a list. 
Client name, Matter type or objective, Client's motivation and outcome, Deal size or value, Team composition and jurisdictions, Innovation or regulatory/ESG impact, Matter status (include full date), Any press or awards.


Transcript: 
{{ JSON.stringify($('post_call_transcription1').item.json.body.data.transcript) }}

=Writing as an expert in composing legal docuemts, re-write the {{ $json.output }} of this matter to ensure it is written in UK English and NOT US English, with the names of people and Companies/Law Firms appropriately spelled and capiatlised, references to currency formatted properly, numbers and values also generally in figures as opposed to words (in keeping with UK English best practice), and with superior general spelling and grammer. You should keep the content as close as possible to the original and NOT add in additional information. Do not include a title at the start, just go straight into the summary conent. Do not provide a sentence at the end where you recap what has been done, just provide the summary output.
